system.description: Changelings have the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-hindrances.IQgZkCUMklDKYV9x]{Outsider} (Minor) Hindrance. If identified as a changeling, they have −1 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.k7fIVOghEx6y44xE]{Persuasion} as other races tend to distrust them, but their changeling instincts still give them some advantage.
